title: LOST Hatch Computer font
content:
Can someone identify this font? It’s from the Hatch Computer on the television show LOST.

[http://www.lost-media.com/modules/coppermine/albums/ep-caps/season2/2x09...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122005254/http:/www.lost-media.com/modules/coppermine/albums/ep-caps/season2/2x09-kate/10/normal_kate-cap997.jpg "http://www.lost-media.com/modules/coppermine/albums/ep-caps/season2/2x09-kate/10/normal\_kate-cap997.jpg")

[http://www.lost-media.com/modules/coppermine/albums/ep-caps/season2/2x02...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122005254/http:/www.lost-media.com/modules/coppermine/albums/ep-caps/season2/2x02-adrift/4a/normal_2x02-adrift-cap290.jpg "http://www.lost-media.com/modules/coppermine/albums/ep-caps/season2/2x02-adrift/4a/normal\_2x02-adrift-cap290.jpg")

Thanks in advance!

dave

 [‹ (x) "Weil am Rhein Jury" humanistic sans - FF Scala Sans {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122005254/http:/typophile.com/node/18959 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tootsie Roll logo - Cooper Black, ??? {Dan, ???} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122005254/http:/typophile.com/node/18948 "Go to next forum topic")
author: defenestration
